channel.title: [PI] bows & Arrows help [PI]
channel.description: I'm currently working on a f2p server and i hit a road bump, when i try to use a maple bow with addy arrows it says, "you can't use adamant arrows with a maple shortbow". You should be able to how would i fix this.

item.title: [PI] bows & Arrows help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @i_code_rsps i code rsps
item.description:
@i_code_rsps wrote:

Its project insanity not delta.

item.title: [PI] bows & Arrows help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @rigorous rigorous
item.description:
@rigorous wrote:

go to client.java

search the ID’s for maple short and addy arrows

when (near the end for mine) you see the message: sM “you cannot use adamant arrows with this bow” or whatever, delete that peice of code, compile and run

hope i helped

Read full topic
